title: SMC_StartVelocity (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_StartVelocity
Sets the transition parameters for velocity based blending
(transition mode
MC_TRANSITION_MODE.TMStartVelocity
).
The outputs can be connected to the inputs
TransitionMode
and
TransitionParameter
of the movement function blocks.

rows.Name: Factor
rows.Comment:
The start-velocity factor.  A factor of 1 (100%) means that
blending is started when the deceleration phase would begin
on the unmodified first movement, and finished when the
acceleration phase would end on the unmodified second movement.
Larger factors lead to a larger blending area, smaller factors
lead to a smaller blending area.

rows:
Defines which axes are taken into account for velocity based
blending.

rows.Name: TransitionMode
rows.Comment:
Can be connected to the input TransitionMode of the movement
function block.

rows:
Can be connected to the TransitionParameter input
of the movement function block.
